title: Always get the same champions shard in new lvl up rewards?
body:
Hi, i'm lvl 40 now and i mostly get low tier shard of champions  that i already own. Out of 10 capsule i got 5 champion shards of champions i do not own (1350 ones). Is this normal? Thanks for answering
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Looks like you own a good portion of the champions already, so your chances of getting a shard you don't own is going to go down of course since there's a smaller set of unowned champs to choose from. The shards are random, but the quantity/quality of what you get should always be 810 at the least.
